captions.text:
Are we even human and are we really real.
Or are we so confused that we forgot what
it feels like to feel.

I mean As the days go by I just grow Cold
hearted

A Senseless soul as I say my good byes to
another sister who was martyred

Paint a picture of a perfect world which is
nothing short of distorted

Nothing short of a disguise
To try to hide all the lies from behind

OF all the children dying
And all the lost lives
As a little girl cries

I'm alive I'm alive I can't believe I'm breathing
See we're alive too sweetie but our hearts

aren't really beating
SEe every time I hear you scream on the screen

I'ma quickly get to leaving
Hit the X please, I mean I really need to

sleep this evening
I mean how can I eat while I watch her bleeding

I mean how can I turn the heat on my heaters
while I watch her freezing

So if I hear her screaming one more time
I'ma hold my breath and close my eyes

and just pretend to be dumb, deaf and blind
And hope to death she doesn't die.

Failing to realise that our silence is a crime
that is lethal

As we sit and blame God for the problem of
evil

Aren't you the All Powerful please turn it
back to peaceful.

Despite the fact He gave us all that we needed
to free these people, Feed these people.
But are we even people?

And are we all really equal.
Or is it okay so as long as it doesn't happen

to you?
As videos gain views all over youtube

and we see them die all day on the news.
As we sit at home so confused.
still not sure what to do

But hang our heads in despair
as we watch vids of kids struggling for air

Screaming to God hoping he's there
See God's right here, but you, you were where?

The only reason He let you watch them suffer
was to see if you would care.

He gave you all this food you never needed
just to see if you'd share

And He gave all this money too just to see
if there's a dollar you would spare

But you would hold on tightly
Daily and nightly

Living life as a dream - hopeful of what it
might be.
But what does life mean

apart from amusement and play
past times and pleasures that are destined

to fade away
left us all deluded thinking we're going to

take this all into our graves. NAY.
Live life as a traveller and only take you

what you need along the way
It's going to leave you empty handed apart

from the deeds you sowed today
from the struggle you put forth and the charity
you chose to pay

So what have you prepared
For that day

when we stand shaking and scared
sweating to our knees and the new born is
left grey haired
AS we are brought forth to our Lord

Ya Allah I seek justice screams the girl we
ignored

From the Ummah that had forsaken me Despite
all the times I had called

From the rubble I roared and I roared
Ya Allah I seek justice from the wealth they

would hoard
From an Ummah that neglected the hungry and

the poor
That slept on a full stomach while we were

left starving next door
Ya Allah you are my witness I couldn't take

it anymore
I was cold and clothe less as I slept naked

on the floors
Ya Allah I seek justice from all the pain

that was caused
Wasn't I worth more than your shopping sprees

at the stores.
And money you splurged at the malls

So if your still breathing, know that there's
people needing your support

I'm pleading to please give and if you've
already given please give some more

For it's not to save their lives at all
... but by Allah it's to save yours.
So Give.

comments.text:
To be honest I don't like your video because it's too painful... And hard 
to watch there's music, and poetry. The Quran says something about poetry, 
and over time I learned to understand it. Your video is too painful and 
most people are misguided... And let's be honest not perfect Muslims, I 
honestly can say Prophet Muhammad (saw) would understand what I mean with 
this message. You have too many poetic videos bro and some of the examples 
are TOO horrific for some sensitive people. What I'm trying to say is 
you're mainstream Islam, if you dig deeper you'll know. But that's only if 
you dig deeper...﻿ basically have to try to practice the Quran not just 
talk about it. Because here you're rapping and in ALL honesty rap is haram. 
So we need to find balance, to become the better Muslim, especially if we 
make ourself a preacher to public eye.﻿ what I'm saying this video isn't 
enough, if we want to touch the community, the true example would be from 
Quran, that's here to guide us.﻿

"Do not be discouraged." -The Holy Quran, from Allah's eyes he wants us to 
leave music, this is hard for me as I'm new to Islam basically, but I just 
want people to be more aware that being melodramatic, hypocrite, or arguing 
can be wrong. It is wrong in fact.﻿
comments.author: Saba Bajwa

comments.text:
First off I do not post those things on a place like youtube. Others get to 
mock the Quran, second Allah cures who he wills, they are cured from Allah 
and taken to him by him. So praise Allah for healing that man, but sir 
there's a reason namaz exists. namaz, Quran, respect to parents, faith in 
one God, respect to community, patience, love, being a true Muslim that's 
how you show it.....

Poetry wasn't meant to be a popular thing, in this guy's channel he says 
how music is haram yet goes around saying and doing the same things, and 
everyone mostly agrees because they don't know more about it.

You think I'm making stuff up? This is common knowledge for all Muslims. 
period.
comments.author: Saba Bajwa

comments.text:
+Saba Bajwa just to let you know the Qasida Burdah is poetry and it was 
because of this  poetry and Allah's mercy that got him cured from his 
paralisis if poetry were haraam then Allah would not have cured the writer

comments.author: Emaad Bhyat

comments.text:
+Jane Harrison it says in the Quran poetry is haram, think about it. 
(certain type of poetry, like rap.. is a good example). Films are haram, 
this video isn't a film but it's mainstream........ he also uses dramatic 
background music, for what? Keep it real, you know. Also, we do need 
lighter examples, because the Prophet was our example, he wouldn't go to 
nonbelievers and blame them for things, he had a way of compassion when 
speaking to others, he didn't go unislamic, problem is these things are 
norm.  This isn't the "straight path", I do know that much. It's not bad 
it's still spreading word of Islam, but lots of people don't like to hear 
the truth. That is the truth. Truth confuses them.......

I swear I saw one example where he was talking about slaughtering your 
mother or something, that seemed too graphic to me, there must be some 
Children watching this channel too. We as Muslims should be hopeful. I am 
in no way am hating, don't misjudge me, I truly care.
comments.author: Saba Bajwa

comments.text:
Sister in all honesty you have misunderstood. Rap is poetry and poetry is 
most certainly not haram. Arguably music is not haram as long as the 
message is clean from vulgar language and the intentions are good etc. You 
are talking about how horrific examples are being used and that people will 
be sensitive to it...well that was the point really, I mean you seeing it 
is horrific and you'd like lighter examples but dear this is what is 
happening in the world today. This atrocities are occurring right now in 
the world. There is no way to sugar coat the realities. Therefore the video 
intended to pull on our heart strings so we can question our humanity, how 
are we allowing this to happen? How are we allowing the oppressors to 
oppress?
comments.author: Jane Harrison

comments.text:
I am not christian nor Muslim...I am not affiliated with any religion. I do 
however Believe in GOD!!! I don't believe that Jesus is GOD though. I do 
believe that Jesus is the Son of GOD. I do believe that Jesus was Enlighten 
by GOD, Chosen by GOD.But to say that GOD manifested himself in a man 
child(JESUS) through immaculate conception, just doesn't make sense to me. 
WHY WOULD GOD THE CREATOR OF ALL THINGS NEED TO GO THRU SUCH TROUBLE.. 
scripture where Jesus says no other comes thru the father except through 
me, did not mean to worship him! It meant you will not get to the father 
unless your heart mind and spirit is on the same plane - you are like 
minded to Jesus, to practice like he did, worship GOD like he did, love 
each other, give charity, be humble, Live your life like Jesus did.  With 
that being said..I don't know how to describe what i feel ...anger, 
sadness,..I want peace in the world. I want everyone to have basic 
necessities.... The babies are suffering from the adults-fighting, greed, 
war, .GOD, ALLAH,JEHOVAH -it doesn't matter what you call him, he is 
watching us, we will have to answer for this. What you do unto the children 
you have done unto him as well. I don't understand why he allows such hurt 
to go on in the world. But everything is not meant for me to understand. 
The bigger question that I ponder is why did he let me happen upon this? 
There is something he wants me to do about this..Now that I know, if i 
remain silent then I too will be punished. I don't have the resources to 
travel to them. So I will send money, boxes whatever I need to do to 
help...I will help with WHATEVER, Even if i speak a different language, I 
don't care. I can no longer take this!!! IT IS TOO MUCH TO BEAR. PPL HAVE 
STOOD IDLE TOO LONG.﻿
comments.author: Mary Thomas

You know what confuses me the most, is most of us would study either Quran 
Bible non of the above or maybe somthing else in particular but what are 
you using it for? Some say because it gives true meaning to life others say 
it can make you pure holy but I'm not too concerned how you phrase it what 
exactly are we using our religious upbringing for? Is it for learning 
scripture after scripture to throw at one another so we can prove someone 
rong and bring them on our side so what are we using our faith for hatred, 
So if the reason is for true meaning why are we arguing, Whether your 
Muslim Christian Jewish or atheist if you don't See innocent people 
suffering over your religious beliefs and can only argue maybe that's what 
it means not to be human. Go ahead prove me Wrong. ﻿
